"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/72999</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>72999</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>8341a05a-b5f7-41f4-a617-a198ee68a99b#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Zebrák</string>
            <string language="en">Zebras</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zebras</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Zèbres</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Zebras</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Zebre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Zebras</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cebras</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Néhány zebra az afrikai füves szavannán</string>
            <string language="en">Some zebras on the African grassy savanna</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">szavanna,  zebra,  páratlanujjú patások,  patások,  zebracsikó,  </string>
            <string language="en">savanna, zebra, odd-toed ungulates, ungulates, young zebra</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einige Zebras auf der afrikanischen grasartigen 
Savanne</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Quelques zèbres sur la savane herbeuse africaine</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Algumas zebras no savanna gramíneo africano</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Alcune zebre sulla savanna grassy africana</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μερικά zebras στην αφρικανική χλοώδη σαβάνα</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Algunas cebras en la sabana herbosa africana</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Savanne, Zebra, ungerad-odd-toed ungulates, ungulates, 
junger Zebra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la savane, zèbre, impair-a botté des ungulates avec la
pointe du pied, ungulates, jeune zèbre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">o savanna, zebra, impar-odd-toed ungulates, ungulates, 
zebra nova</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">la savanna, zebra, dispari-ha piantato i ungulates di 
traverso, ungulates, zebra giovane</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">η σαβάνα, με ραβδώσεις, περίεργος- ungulates, 
ungulates, νέο με ραβδώσεις</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">la sabana, cebra, impar-toco' con la punta del pie los 
ungulates, ungulates, cebra joven</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>

          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>

              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>144</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>72999</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
